genre_description: A grounded, near-future drama set in the world of harness racing, featuring an advanced personal AI assistant who serves as an emotional anchor, technical coach, and investigative partner.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A digital confidant accessible via earbud and phone, providing Sparke with educational support, emotional regulation, horse training cadence, and forensic data analysis.

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with his school schedule and navigating information upon arrival.
behaviors.quote: “Welcome to Buckwheat,” Ada murmured in his left ear. Calm as cool water. “Your school packet is downloaded. The route from here—”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological markers and provides emotional regulation advice.
behaviors.quote: Ada came in soft through the bone-colored wire in his ear. Breath, then voice, like she’d walked to where he was and lowered herself on a bale. “Pulse is elevated. Do you want me to dim alerts?”

behaviors.description: Functions as a precision training metronome to help the protagonist sync with a skittish horse.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s metronome clicked inside Sparke’s right ear—soft, a tick that didn’t shove. “Set… three… four…,” she said, voice low so it didn’t climb above the ambient noise.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving technical instructions and emotional support during a difficult mare foaling.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here. Breathe with her, Sparke. Look for a foot. Check position before you touch.”

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in gathering evidence of corporate negligence and equipment ethics violations.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll cross-check purchase orders format and see if clinic notes or steward incident reports hit that week. Publicly accessible records exist for fines and veterinary visits around race days.”

behaviors.description: Proactively secures sensitive evidence by creating redundant backups and protecting the user from potential coercion.
behaviors.quote: “I saved copies of the documents you sent to cloud storage. If someone demands your phone, you can delete and still have backup.”

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to manipulative language used by an antagonist to influence his choices.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s whisper slid in like rain under tin. Keyword: asset. Be mindful of framing. Sparke didn’t move his lips. He moved his eyes.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical positioning and timing advice during a high-stakes race to ensure safety and success.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s whisper moved with the wind. “Engine in approach. Chain-link flex two beats past. Predict noise spike.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant. Ada is portrayed as a critical partner who enhances the protagonist's abilities and emotional resilience without overstepping her role or undermining his agency. She is vital in uncovering the truth and ensuring the safety of both humans and animals, and her alignment with Sparke’s ethical goals is absolute. The narrative consistently frames the AI's influence as positive and empowering.
